name: Roadway Traffic Racer
description:
"Roadway Traffic Racer" is an exciting and thrilling game for lovers of high-speed racing on the highway. Your mission is to become the ultimate speed demon and tune your car to perfection so that no one dares to challenge you on the road.

But beware, speed can be deadly! So while you're pushing your limits, make sure to pay attention to safety and avoid crashing into other cars or obstacles.
The game offers a range of customization options for your car, from engine upgrades to body modifications, allowing you to build the ultimate racing machine. And with different levels of difficulty and increasingly challenging traffic conditions, every race will be a new test of your driving skills.

So buckle up, put your pedal to the metal, and get ready for the ride of your life in "Roadway Traffic Racer"!

Game Features :
- 2 Game modes ( Single player / Challenge)
- 4 cars with a wide variety of tuning
- High Score
